abstract: United States Court of Appeals in New York affirms previous ruling that sets royalty rate of 1.85 percent for public performance of songs in Ascap's catalog for Pandora Media and other Internet radio services; Pandora also gets favorable decision from Federal Communications Commission in service's attempt to buy South Dakota radio station.
lead_paragraph: Earlier in the week, the F.C.C. removed a major hurdle in Pandora’s planned purchase of a radio station in South Dakota.

headline.main: Pandora Wins Appeals Court Ruling on Ascap Royalty Rates

snippet: Earlier in the week, the F.C.C. removed a major hurdle in Pandora’s planned purchase of a radio station in South Dakota.
